main_features.name: Web Scraping Engine
main_features.description: Scrapes the index of EU funding opportunities and extracts details from individual pages.

main_features.name: Database Management
main_features.description: Manages a PostgreSQL database with a 'calls' table for storing convocatoria data.

main_features.name: Dashboard
main_features.description: Provides a web interface to monitor the status of the system, scraping statistics, and analysis results.

corrective_actions.error: Validation Error: NameError: name 'get_db' is not defined
corrective_actions.action: Ensure that the `get_db` function is properly imported or defined in the file where it is needed.
